item.description:
Minasan, good tenki permitting, let's go and whack some balls at one of the best mini-golf course in the East Coast, as a plus -> minimal golf skill is required :-). And for the more ambitious, they have also got an excellent driving range. The mini-golf is about $7 for 18 holes, and the driving range is $9 per bucket of balls. People can do either or both. Afterwards, we can catch some saki / sushi in around Cleveland Circle / Coolidge Corner.

Here is the Link - http://www.mcgolfonline.com/

One last thing: for those coming by public transportation, since this place is close to three T-Stations (Cleveland Circle/Resevoir, which are near each other, and Forest Hills), but a bit far for walking, I need people to sign up early and and tell us which station they will come by, so we can plan to pick people up at the station.
item.name: Sports Meetup - MiniGolf / Driving Range
